definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off

sentences.english: The long-distance runner was dead beat as he crossed the finishing line.
sentences.chinese: 長跑運動員在衝過終點線時已筋疲力盡。

sentences.english: Wang Junxia is the record-holder of the long distance race.
sentences.chinese: 王軍霞是長跑的記錄保持者。

sentences.english: The Los Angeles to New Jersey footrace did not sound quite so appealing.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉磯到新澤西的長跑，叫起來就不那麼響亮了。

sentences.english: Also can ease the discomfort caused by long-distance running, can be described as co-existence together beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 同時也能緩解長跑所帶來的不適，可謂兩全齊美。

sentences.english: Who wins who is the long-distance running champion.
This article makes an analysis of middle -distance and long-distance running.
sentences.chinese: 本文對中長跑比賽的相關問題加以淺析。

sentences.english: It's what the Chinese women distance runners use to improve their endurance.
sentences.chinese: 中國的長跑女將都是用這個來增強耐力的。

sentences.english: Little rabbit heard a lamb is a long-distance running champion.
sentences.chinese: 一隻小羊聽說了小兔子是個長跑冠軍。

sentences.english: Growing in love is a lot like being a marathon runner.
sentences.chinese: 在愛中成長放佛是在進行一次馬拉松長跑。

sentences.english: The program I am using was created by a two-time Olympic Distance runner.
sentences.chinese: 我需用的訓練計劃來自於兩屆奧林匹克長跑運動員。

sentences.english: On Factors Affecting Middle and Long-distance Running Teaching Effect and Their Countermeasures at College Abstract: Through literature research, interview and mathematical st.
sentences.chinese: 普通高校中長跑教學效果的影響因素分析與對策研究。

sentences.english: Then, pick one day a week as your "long" run day.
sentences.chinese: 然後一個禮拜選一天做爲你的長跑日。

sentences.english: Tong married Guan at the end of last year after a seven-year love marathon.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 佟大爲和關悅經過7年愛情長跑，於去年底登記結婚。

sentences.english: Finishing a long run is a very rewarding experience.
sentences.chinese: 完成一段長跑是一項非常有益的體驗。

sentences.english: Long-distance running may be the best exercise for your brain.
sentences.chinese: 長跑可能是對大腦的最佳鍛鍊。

sentences.english: Running in a 5K is a great way to get in shape.
sentences.chinese: 5千米長跑對保持體形很有幫助。

definition: to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
